page.title: 12Urban Working Wife: Fintry
page.content: {7.30}Clock-alarm goes. Get up. Open curtains, raining again. Elder girl in shower. Breakfast: half grapefruit & slice of toast. Eat and see to washing machine. Elder girl breakfasts, dashes to catch lift to Stirling. No buses. 3 girls share car. Hubby & 2nd daughter appear. Grab shower - always last. {8.45}Everybody out.Husband to contract site. Younger girl & I to the office. {9.30}Arrive office - hours flexible, benefit of own business - salad lunch. {4.30}Head for home. No need to shop, do it monthly. Its stopped raining. {5.15}Buy stamps for office - use local Post Office, must do bit to keep it open. Hang out washing,still damp damn {6.30}Quick meal with weekend leftovers {Evening}Arrange Drama meeting.Jogging. Chat with husband about tomorrow.Phone {11.30}Collect girls off Kippen bus. {12.30}See end of tv film.{ Turn in.
